name: Inspira Santa Marta Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have been at Inspira Hotel for two days in July 2010, it was a great experience! Very pleasant environment and people were very useful and always careful to our needs.
reviews.title: At last, Lisbon has a refine designed and tasteful hotel.

description: Inspira Santa Marta Hotel is a medium-sized, 4 star hotel offering an urban retreat to those visiting Lisbon for business or pleasure. The hotel is located in the heart of the city, in Rua de Santa Marta, just off Avenida da Liberdade. With a contemporary décor, Santa Marta Hotel offers 89 rooms of different categories. Here lighting, color, sound, energy and materials have been carefully designed and put together according to the principles of Feng Shui. The rooms are equipped with integrated, cutting-edge technology allowing guests the freedom to remain in touch with business colleagues, family and friends and to access local information – all at the touch of a button or two. Whether visiting Lisbon on business or leisure, our aim is to provide our guests with a memorable stay.
